org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine
Interface IAeProcessLogger

All Superinterfaces:
IAeProcessListener
All Known Subinterfaces:
IAePersistentLogger
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeInMemoryProcessLogger, AePersistentLogger
public interface IAeProcessLogger
extends IAeProcessListener

Interface for class that logs process events for the engine.

Method Detail

getAbbreviatedLog

public java.lang.String getAbbreviatedLog(long aProcessId)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
Gets an abbreviated form of the log which is suitable for display in the remote debug console or in the admin console. The String returned will contain a configurable amount of the head and tail of the log. The system default is approximately the top 100 lines and the bottom 500 lines, but this will vary with how the logger is implemented.

Parameters:
aProcessId -
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getFullLog

public java.io.Reader getFullLog(long aProcessId)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
Returns the entire log as a reader. The size of the log is unknown but it should be assumed that it is not safe to read the entire contents into memory.

Parameters:
aProcessId -
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

setEngine

public void setEngine(IAeBusinessProcessEngineInternal aEngine)
Setter for the engine.

Parameters:
aEngine -
